Curriculum Vitae
Saurabh Kishorbhai Seta
E-107, Chhatrapati Shivaji Township,      +919714310693
Near Amrut Residency-3,                                        saurabhseta1@gmail.com
B/h Railnagar,
Rajkot-360 001
Gujarat
Career Aspiration:
By acquiring knowledge, expertise and a familiarity with the organization’s
culture, I want to contribute towards realizing organization’s vision and
become its integral part.
To pursue a dynamic and challenging career with an organization of repute
which gives value addition to the organization as well as offers opportunity
to enhance professional skills while getting a high level of satisfaction and
recognition
To obtain challenging and responsible position in an organization wherein I
can contribute to the successful growth of an Organization using my abilities
and knowledge.
Professional Experience:
With CA Firm:
I  have  worked  As  An  Audit  Executive  in  Hiren  Padiya  &  Co.,  Chartered
Accountants, Rajkot (Gujarat).
Period: From July 2013 to June 2014
In the aforesaid training period, I was mainly involved in statutory and tax audits,
Internal  Audits  of  the  public  Company,  Private  Company,  Partnership  Firm,
Individual etc. and office administration.
In the above mentioned Entities, Consultancies in the field of Service tax has also
been provided in addition to Audit.
With ICICI Bank (Rajkot) :
I have worked As  An Credit Officer  in ICICI Bank, Loan Department in Rajkot
Branch.
Period: From June 2014 to April 2015
My job profile was to review personal loan application form filled by the customers,
preparation of loan and EMI structure, verification of personal loan documentation
and Preparation of Management Information System (MIS) on personal loan of
Branch. With Taageer Finance Co SAOG (Muscat, OMAN) :
I have worked As An Accountant Cum Treasury Officer  in Taageer Finance Co
SAOG, Treasury department in Muscat, Oman
Period: From May 2015 to November 2016
I was handling the treasury department, monitoring short term and long term loan 
as well as bank reconciliation for the organization.
With Dealing Beneficial Financial Services Pvt. Ltd. (Rajkot) :
Currently I am working As An Accountant Cum IT Officer  with Dealing Beneficial
Financial Services Pvt. Ltd. (NBFC) approved by RBI.
Period: From December 2016
My job profile is to review all secured & unsecured loan application form filled by
the customers, preparation of loan and EMI structure, verification of all type of loan
documentation, Preparation of Management Information System (MIS) on secured
& unsecured loans of Branch, As well as Involved In Accounting Part & Bank
Reconciliation Of The Organization. 
Academic Qualifications:
I have Cleared Std. 10 in 2008 with 69.38% with Gujarat Secondary and
Higher Secondary Education Board.
I have Cleared Std. 12 in 2010 with 70.86% with Gujarat Secondary and
Higher Secondary Education Board.
I got the degree of  Bachelor of Commerce  in 2013 with  57.65%  with
Saurashtra University.
I  have  Cleared  CPT  Exam in  2012  with  52% with  The  Institute  of
Chartered Accountants of India.
Computer Proficiency:
Having working knowledge of computers in MS Office accounting packages
like TALLY.
Familiar with Internet Operations.
Can easily adapt to any software or any computerized environment.
Strengths & Skills:
Strong  leadership  skills  with  an  ability  to  motivate  teams  in  achieving
targets and goals
A self confident person and believes in smart & hard work.
Achievement oriented with an ability to manage change with ease.
Ability to handle multitasking.
Quick Learning, Adaptability, Loyalty are my greatest asset.Personal Profile:
  
Father : Kishorbhai M. Seta
Mother : Bhavnaben K. Seta
Date of Birth : 10th June 1993.
Languages Known : Gujarati, Hindi and English
Marital Status : Married
Hobbies & Interests : Expanding knowledge, Listening Songs
Yours truly,
Saurabh K. Seta
